mapper.select: select id, good_name, good_price, good_category, good_introduction, good_sales, good_options, good_picture, good_store, good_comment_count, real_inventory, virtual_inventory from goods where id = #{id}

select id, good_name, good_price, good_category, good_introduction, good_sales, good_options, good_picture, good_store, good_comment_count, real_inventory, virtual_inventory from goods where good_name = #{goodName}

select id, good_name, good_price, good_category, good_introduction, good_sales, good_options, good_picture, good_store, good_comment_count, real_inventory, virtual_inventory from goods where good_store = #{storeId} order by id desc

select id, good_name, good_price, good_category, good_introduction, good_sales, good_options, good_picture, good_store, good_comment_count, real_inventory, virtual_inventory from goods where good_category = #{goodCategory}

select id, good_name, good_price, good_category, good_introduction, good_sales, good_options, good_picture, good_store, good_comment_count, real_inventory, virtual_inventory from goods order by good_sales desc, id desc limit 0,24

select id, good_name, good_price, good_category, good_introduction, good_sales, good_options, good_picture, good_store, good_comment_count, real_inventory, virtual_inventory from goods where good_name like "%"#{searchString}"%" order by good_sales desc
mapper.insert: insert into goods (id, good_name, good_price, good_category, good_introduction, good_sales, good_options, good_picture, good_store, good_comment_count, real_inventory, virtual_inventory) values (#{id},#{goodName},#{goodPrice},#{goodCategory},#{goodIntroduction},#{goodSales},#{goodOptions},#{goodPicture},#{goodStore},#{goodCommentCount},#{realInventory},#{virtualInventory})
mapper.update: update goods set good_name = #{goodName} where id = #{id}
update goods set good_price = #{goodPrice} where id = #{id}
update goods set good_sales = good_sales + #{sales} where id = #{id}
update goods set good_comment_count = good_comment_count + 1 where id = #{id}
update goods set virtual_inventory = virtual_inventory - #{quantity} where id = #{id}
update goods set real_inventory = real_inventory - #{quantity} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select real_inventory from goods where id = #{id}
select virtual_inventory from goods where id = #{id}
